.. _module1_interpreter_vs_compiler:

Module 1: Interpreter vs Compiler
=================================

.. image:: ../module_1/Compiler vs Interpreter Key Differences - visual selection.png
   :alt: Compiler vs Interpreter Key Differences
   :width: 600

Interpreter vs Compiler
----------------------

- Interpreter executes code line by line (e.g., Python)
- Compiler translates entire code to machine language before execution (e.g., C, C++)
- Interpreted languages are easier for debugging and rapid prototyping
- Compiled languages generally offer better performance
